title: Airbus sees global aircraft fleet doubling by 2044, led by India
description: The global in-service fleet will swell by 24,480 units to 49,210 aircraft in 2044, Airbus predicted in its latest global market forecast

title: Global carriers pile on India capacity as US-Europe traffic drops
description: India is already the world’s third-largest domestic aviation market and the country’s rising middle class makes the nation of more than 1.4 billion people a crucial driver of future growth
